AT.name: Nintendo präsentiert: New Style Boutique™ 3
AT.description: In „Nintendo präsentiert: New Style Boutique 3 – Styling Star“ leitest du deine eigene Boutique, triffst Kunden und findest schicke Outfits für sie. Diesmal entwickeln sich die Geschichten deiner Kunden anders, je nachdem, welches Outfit du für sie auswählst. Werde ein angesagter Stylist und arbeite mit herangehenden Stars! Welcher Look passt zu ihrem Bühnendebüt? Du entscheidest! Wähle aus über 20.000 Modeartikeln aus! Unter amiibo.nintendo.eu findest du eine Liste kompatibler amiibo™ und aktuelle Informationen. Um amiibo auf Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- und Nintendo 2DS-Systemen zu benutzen, wird ein Nintendo 3DS-NFC-Lese-/Schreibgerät benötigt.

AU.name: Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique™ 3
AU.description: In Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique 3 – Styling Star, manage your own fashion boutique, meet customers and find stylish outfits to suit their needs. This time, your customers’ stories may unfold differently based on the outfits you select. Become a top stylist and work with stars-to-be! Which look will they rock for their on-stage debut? It’s up to you! Choose from over 20,000 new and returning fashion items, with much more to discover. Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BG.name: Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique™ 3
BG.description: In Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique 3 – Styling Star, manage your own fashion boutique, meet customers and find stylish outfits to suit their needs. This time, your customers’ stories may unfold differently based on the outfits you select. Become a top stylist and work with stars-to-be! Which look will they rock for their on-stage debut? It’s up to you! Choose from over 20,000 new and returning fashion items, with much more to discover. Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BE.name: Nintendo présente : New Style Boutique™ 3
BE.description: Dans Nintendo présente : La Nouvelle Maison du Style™ 3 – Looks de Stars, gérez votre propre boutique de mode et trouvez des tenues pleines de style pour les clientes que vous rencontrez. Cette fois, les histoires de vos clientes évoluent en fonction des tenues que vous leur proposez. Incarnez une styliste de talent et interagissez avec de futures stars ! Quelles tenues vont-elles porter pour leurs débuts sur scène ? C'est à vous de choisir ! Choisissez parmi plus de 20 000 articles nouveaux et anciens, et découvrez bien d'autres choses. Visitez le site amiibo.nintendo.eu pour voir la liste des amiibo™ compatibles et en savoir plus. Un lecteur/enregistreur NFC est nécessaire pour utiliser les amiibo avec les consoles Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL et Nintendo 2DS.

movies.name: New Style Boutique 3 : Bande-annonce de présentation

ES.name: Nintendo presenta: New Style Boutique™ 3
ES.description: En Nintendo presenta: New Style Boutique 3 - Estilismo para celebrities, llevarás tu propia boutique, atenderás a los clientes y les buscarás conjuntos adecuados a su estilo. Esta vez, las historias de los clientes se desarrollarán de manera diferente dependiendo de los conjuntos que elijas. Conviértete en estilista de renombre y trabaja con estrellas en ascenso. ¿Qué "look" deben llevar para su debut sobre el escenario? ¡La decisión es tuya! Elige entre más de 20 000 prendas nuevas y de otras ediciones, con muchas más cosas por descubrir. Visita amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar la lista de amiibo™ compatibles y la información más reciente. El lector/grabador de NFC para Nintendo 3DS estará disponible más adelante este año.

movies.name: New Style Boutique 3: Tráiler de presentación

IT.name: Nintendo presenta: New Style Boutique™ 3
IT.description: In Nintendo presenta: New Style Boutique 3 - La moda delle star devi gestire la tua boutique, interagire con i clienti e soddisfare le loro richieste. Questa volta, le storie dei tuoi clienti potrebbero evolversi in modi diversi a seconda del look che scegli per loro. Diventa una stilista di grido e lavora con aspiranti star! Che abiti indosseranno per il loro debutto sul palco? Sta a te deciderlo! Scegli fra più di 20.000 capi, con molto altro da scoprire. Consulta il sito amiibo.nintendo.eu per maggiori dettagli sugli amiibo™ compatibili e informazioni aggiornate. Per usare gli amiibo con la console Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS è necessario un lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS. Il lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS sarà disponibile quest'anno.

NL.name: Nintendo presenteert: New Style Boutique™ 3
NL.description: In Nintendo presenteert: New Style Boutique 3 - Sterstyliste beheer je je eigen boetiek, maak je kennis met klanten en zoek je stijlvolle outfits voor ze. Dit keer kan jouw keuze bepalen hoe de dag van je klanten eruitziet. Word een topstyliste en werk met aanstormende sterren! Welke look past bij hun podiumdebuut? Die keuze is aan jou! Kies uit meer dan 20.000 nieuwe en terugkerende mode-artikelen. Kijk op amiibo.nintendo.eu voor compatibele amiibo™ en de meest recente informatie. Om amiibo te gebruiken op Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- en/of Nintendo 2DS-systemen is een NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS nodig. De NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS zal later dit jaar beschikbaar komen.

NZ.name: Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique™ 3
NZ.description: In Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique 3 – Styling Star, manage your own fashion boutique, meet customers and find stylish outfits to suit their needs. This time, your customers’ stories may unfold differently based on the outfits you select. Become a top stylist and work with stars-to-be! Which look will they rock for their on-stage debut? PT.name: Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique™ 3
PT.description: Em Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique 3 – Styling Star, terão de gerir uma loja de moda e encontrar as roupas mais adequadas para cada uma das vossas clientes. Desta vez, as histórias das vossas clientes poderão desenrolar-se de forma diferente consoante as roupas que escolherem. Tornem-se em estilistas de topo e trabalhem com estrelas em ascensão! Que visual adotarão para a sua estreia em palco? Serão vocês a decidir! Contarão com 20 mil peças de roupa e acessórios, tanto novas como repetentes, a que se juntarão muitas outras! Aceda a amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar a lista de amiibo™ compatíveis e as informações mais recentes. Para usar os amiibo com as Consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS, é necessário um leitor/gravador de NFC Nintendo 3DS.

movies.name: New Style Boutique 3: Trailer de apresentação

RU.name: Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique 3
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В игре Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique 3 – Styling Star откройте собственный бутик, встречайте посетителей и подбирайте для них модную одежду. В этот раз судьбы ваших клиентов будут меняться в зависимости от выбранных вами нарядов. Станьте ведущим стилистом и работайте с будущими звездами! Какой образ подойдет для дебюта на сцене? Решать вам! Выбирайте из более 20 000 новых и уже знакомых модных предметов. Посетите amiibo.nintendo.eu для получения информации о совместимых amiibo™ и прочей актуальной информации. Чтобы использовать amiibo с системами Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL или Nintendo 2DS, необходимо устройство чтения/записи NFC для Nintendo 3DS.
